ch0204_00_lanuit/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello-how-are-ya? I was hoping I’d get to
see ya!
ch0204_00_lanuit/0101_0701_02_10:
No time for banter. Let’s have some fun! Get
ready! Hyah!
ch0204_00_lanuit/7101_0701_01_10:
At the Battle Maison, I’d be in charge of the
Single Battles myself.
ch0204_00_lanuit/7101_0701_02_10:
So I don’t much understand all these teams and
combinations and such.
ch0204_00_lanuit/7101_0701_03_10: All a battle has to be is cracking good fun!
ch0204_00_lanuit/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], did ya have fun
battling on a team with me?
ch0204_00_lanuit/7105_0701_03_10:
Fair play! Battling alongside you was a cracking
good time, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0204_00_lanuit/1701_0702_01_10: You best treasure that present from me, pet!
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve got three older sisters, you see! But they’re
always in a tiff.
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0701_02_10: Dana likes to scold, but she isn’t much of a scare.
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0701_03_10:
But when Morgan is in a mood, she’s a fierce
bit scary.
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0701_04_10:
She’s kind to guests, but you should still
mind yourself!
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0702_01_10: I’ve never made Evelyn cross before.
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0702_02_10:
A kind sis, she is. Even agrees to be my
partner in co-op battles!
ch0204_00_lanuit/2501_0702_03_10:
But we always lose, so we don’t make a habit of
teaming up in the Battle Maison against
guests much.
ch0204_00_lanuit/3001_0701_01_10:
Top o’ the morning to ya! Ready to have a ton o’
fun out there today?
ch0204_00_lanuit/3003_0701_01_10:
Oi! Let Nita know when yer ready for a break,
would ya? I’ve got biscuits and tea to share!
ch0204_00_lanuit/3005_0701_01_10:
Why does everything fun have to end so soon?
If it were up to Nita, we’d have holidays every
day o’ the year, we would!
